thread.title: BRIEF-Hua Hong Semiconductor Posts Qtrly Profit Of US$‍41.5​ Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Hua Hong Semiconductor Posts Qtrly Profit Of US$‍41.5​ Mln
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Hua Hong Semiconductor Ltd:
* QTRLY PROFIT FOR THE PERIOD US$‍41.5​ MILLION VERSUS US$38.2 MILLION
* QTRLY REVENUE US$216.9 MILLION, UP 11.8 PERCENT * ‍EXPECT Q1 2018 REVENUE TO BE BETWEEN US$209 MILLION AND US$210 MILLION​
* ‍EXPECT Q1 2018 GROSS MARGIN TO BE APPROXIMATELY 30%​ * Q1 REVENUE IS EXPECTED TO GROW 14 PERCENT TO 15 PERCENT, Y/Y Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
